We are seeing the following exception on builds. It appears to occur when Perforce is installed. I'm guessing that the normal mechanism for saving the project indexer setting fails when perforce has the file system locked. The PDOMManager keeps trying and trying to save it and finally runs into the build manager which has the whole workspace locked.

There are two issues, is there something we need to do to ensure project preferences get saved in the context of a CM system that needs to do a checkout first. Second, can we avoid saving while workspace locks prevent us, and, thus avoid the exception.
